article_title: the Obama Administration Doesn't Care Whether You Work Or Not

article_metadata.description: It was mildly surprising  when the Congressional Budget Office announced this week that the Affordable Care Act will result in some 2.5 million fewer Americans working than otherwise. What was shocking was that the Obama administration response revealed that the president is simply indifferent to whether you have a job [...]
article_metadata.author: Kyle Smith
